page.title: 10INTERESTS GAMES and HOBBIES
page.content: There are alot of children who like outdoor games, such as 40-40, football, riding, biking, netball and tig. Most people on the other hand like indoor games, some of them are Four-in-a-row, craft cards and Elite, which is a computer game. One person in school likes Judo which you can't do at home so you have to go to a Sports Centre, the same with Squash. Lots of children collect things such as shells, keyrings, rubbers, bookmarkers, postcards and fossils. Lots of people like fishing near the River Ray where it is not so fast.
